summary: We recently published a list of 12 AI Stocks on Analysts’ Radar. headline: Indeed Deploys Agentforce to Streamline Employer Onboarding with AI-Powered Support
summary: SAN FRANCISCO & AUSTIN, Texas, May 21, 2025--Salesforce (NYSE: CRM), the world’s #1 AI CRM, today announced that Indeed, the world’s #1 job site, is deploying Agentforce to support employer account onboarding with digital labor. By leveraging AI agents to automate routine administrative tasks, Indeed aims to scale its support operations, enabling teams to handle more complex issues and build stronger relationships with employers to help accelerate hiring.

raw.headline: Indeed Deploys Agentforce to Streamline Employer Onboarding with AI-Powered Support
raw.summary: SAN FRANCISCO & AUSTIN, Texas, May 21, 2025--Salesforce (NYSE: CRM), the world’s #1 AI CRM, today announced that Indeed, the world’s #1 job site, is deploying Agentforce to support employer account onboarding with digital labor. By leveraging AI agents to automate routine administrative tasks, Indeed aims to scale its support operations, enabling teams to handle more complex issues and build stronger relationships with employers to help accelerate hiring.

headline: Lazard Global Equity Select Portfolio Q1 2025 Commentary
summary: Equity markets worldwide receded in the first quarter, as the outlooks for corporate spending and global economic growth were affected by US tariff plans.

headline: 3 S&P 500 Stocks Facing Headwinds
summary: The S&P 500 (^GSPC) is often seen as a benchmark for strong businesses, but that doesn’t mean every stock is worth owning. Some companies face significant challenges, whether it’s stagnating growth, heavy debt, or disruptive new competitors.

raw.headline: 3 S&P 500 Stocks Facing Headwinds
